name: Hellfang

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 21%.

skills.name: Tear
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of putting the target's skills on cooldown.
Damage based on: [ATK]

Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%

Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Chilling Howl

Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn.
